txt.en:
\q'Farin, Blackmattock, fared afar 
By shining sun and sheen of star 
And found what once was merely myth 
That red-veined peak, the Rusted Lith 

And stayed among the Hills of Iron 
Iron hard and iron cold'\q

\q'For years in Járnfast all was well 
But ages end, and times grow fell 
Black Thangorodrim fell in thunder 
And split the world's stone spine asunder 

Shattered was the Hold of Iron 
Iron hard and iron cold'\q

\q'The Fast's foundation stones were rent 
The throng spilled forth without relent 
Till Grár descended, stern and swift 
And broke the roof above the rift 

Grár the Grim-brow died for Iron 
Iron hard and iron cold'\q

\qAlas, the peril had not passed 
Morgoth's moaning host amassed 
In cracks and cleavings under hill 
Nameless beasts, with yearnings ill 

Fell things moved ’neath seams of Iron 
Iron hard and iron cold'\q
Rusted pages can be found scattered around the Ironfold.\n\nYou should collect the pages to complete the story.
You've found a torn page of a tome, rust-coloured from the iron in the soil of the Ironfold. Perhaps you can find other pages around the Ironfold and complete the story.

\q'Lord Frár took up his liege's maul 
He called his council, wise dwarves all 
To bid them bar his father's grave 
So no fiend could escape the cave 

The crack was bound with bonds of Iron 
Iron hard and iron cold'\q

\q'His delvings found a wealth of ore 
Its worth a hundred hoards and more 
A carven keep he wrought to last 
Hewn from hillside: stout Járnfast 

Blackmattock became Lord of Iron 
Iron hard and iron cold'\q
Completed.

\q'Above the Pit, three gates of steel 
Upon the last, a mithril seal 
Graven rune-spells guard that curtain 
Break them not, or doom is certain 

Thus is writ the Rede of Iron 
Iron hard and iron cold'\q
Lost Lore of the Dwarf-holds: Ironfold
Collect page 2

\q'The wealth of Khazad-dûm is known 
Fair gems and mithril deck its throne 
And yet that gold-rich kingdom lacks 
The heart of hauberk, sword, and axe 

And so we went forth seeking Iron 
Iron hard and iron cold'\q
Collect page 3

The story is complete. From the poem, you have learned the tale of the Longbeards coming to the Ironfold, the destruction of Járnfast, the reconstruction, and the existence of a Nameless horde beneath the hold. You wonder if the recent eruption of Orodruin has affected the mithril seal holding back the evil in the Howling Pit....
Collect page 4

\q'The cleft collapsed; Grár was no more 
His mattock fell upon the floor 
Morgoth's monsters shrieked and spit 
Imprisoned in the Howling Pit 

The horde remains entombed in Iron 
Iron hard and iron cold'\q
Collect page 5
Collect page 6
Collect page 7

\q'Still through long years of dauntless toil 
Lord Grár the Grave dug stone and soil 
The Fast was mended, whole once more 
And grander even than before 

And so returned our wealth of Iron 
Iron hard and iron cold'\q
Collect page 8
Collect page 9
Collect page 10
Completed
Collect page 1
Pages of a tome can be found scattered around the Ironfold. Perhaps you can complete the story if you find them all.
